title: runtime: darwin/arm64 panics with slice bounds out of range error
body:
Not consistently reproducible, but make.bash occasionally panics with slice bounds out of range error.

```
$ CGO_ENABLED=1 GOARCH=arm64 CC_FOR_TARGET=`pwd`/../misc/ios/clangwrap.sh CXX_FOR_TARGET=`pwd`/../misc/ios/clangwrap.sh ./make.bash

##### Building packages and commands for host, darwin/amd64.
runtime
errors
sync/atomic
unicode
unicode/utf8
math
sort
container/list
container/ring
crypto/subtle
encoding
unicode/utf16
sync
image/color
runtime/race
cmd/vet/whitelist
container/heap
image/color/palette
io
syscall
internal/singleflight
hash
crypto/cipher
hash/crc32
hash/adler32
crypto/hmac
hash/crc64
hash/fnv
bytes
strings
bufio
text/tabwriter
panic: runtime error: slice bounds out of range
fatal error: panic on system stack
time
```
